roles.title: Junior Full-Stack Developer
descriptions: Worked as the company’s Frontend specialist in a small team, operating mainly in Finland
Dealt with IT consulting, DevOps, CI/CD, Cloud provisioning and Software infrastructure

roles.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
descriptions: Worked on several projects, both self-training personal and commercial ones with React.js, MongoDB, Node.js and Flutter.
Picked up practical and theoretical fundamentals and more while solving real-life customer issues.

name: National High School of Mathematics and Science

roles.title: Mathematics & Informatics
descriptions: Qualified for the final round of NOIT`22 - 'Modern visual information systems' category
Started working at my family's computer hardware store during summer breaks
Learned the essentials of computer hardware, systems, networking and managing, as well as CCTV installation and management
My time there inspired me to further pursue programming professionally
